data.value: One-dimensional linear interpolation for monotonically increasing sample points.
The x-coordinate sequence is expected to be increasing, but this is not explicitly enforced.  However, if the sequence
is non-increasing, interpolation results are meaningless.
Note that, since NaN is unsortable,
Plot an interpolant to the sine function:
